page.title: 03THE HOME FARM 2 (Arable)
page.content:
sprayed with chemicals. The farm has two major problems. The deer from the nearby National Trust Woodland often feed on the barley. The rabbits from the woods have eaten nearly 2 acres of crops this year. An expensive chicken mesh fence about 2 miles long around the field has been used to deter the predators as neither shooting nor gas has helped matters in the past. The farm ownership has changed hands 3 times in less than 5 years for no apparent reason.
Grid ref.: 6076 & 6176 Land Use : Arable
